name: One Flip
description:
[ How to play ]

At the start of every map, you will be given a moderate amount of visibility.
With that given light, you have to pan around the map by using the arrow keys and memorize the map layout before moving. 
Once you press WASD, the light will immediately be turned off, and you will be only visible by a small glimpse of light left. 
With what you remembered, you have to navigate your way out of the dungeon.
You'll die when you make a mistake after the lights turned off.

W A S D : To Move
Arrow Key : Pan around the map before darkness arrive


How it fits the theme?

In One Flip, the player is only given a SINGLE chance to look through the entire map layout before the lights get turned off and the player will be submerged in DARKNESS.
